title: Rune pickaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The rune pickaxe is the third best pickaxe, after the crystal pickaxe and the dragon pickaxe. It is the best pickaxe in free-to-play. The rune pickaxe requires 41 Mining to use, and 40 Attack to equip. Players lacking 40 Attack can still use it for mining. Players cannot smith the rune pickaxe, so it must be obtained from other players or from a shop, as a monster drop, or as a quest reward from the quest "Between a Rock...".

Item ID1275

The rune pickaxe is the third best pickaxe, after the crystal pickaxe and the dragon pickaxe. It is the best pickaxe in free-to-play. The rune pickaxe requires 41 Mining to use, and 40 Attack to equip. Players lacking 40 Attack can still use it for mining. Players cannot smith the rune pickaxe, so it must be obtained from other players or from a shop, as a monster drop, or as a quest reward from the quest "Between a Rock...".

[[File:Rune pickaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''rune pickaxe''' is the third best [[pickaxe]], after the [[crystal pickaxe]] and the [[dragon pickaxe]]. It is the best pickaxe in [[free-to-play]]. The rune pickaxe requires 41 [[Mining]] to use, and 40 [[Attack]] to equip. Players lacking 40 Attack can still use it for mining. Players '''cannot''' smith the rune pickaxe, so it must be obtained from other players or from a shop, as a monster drop, or as a quest reward from the quest "[[Between a Rock...]]".
